availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Christopher Cummins (Pendleton County and Bracken County, Kentucky, farm worker.)

body.p: Pendleton County and Bracken County, Kentucky, farm laborer and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Cummins and Nancy Cummins. Married to Minerva Dickerson Cummins in Bracken County, Kentucky, on September 28, 1861. Father of Netta M. Cummins and Thomas Cummins. Resident of Pendleton County in 1850. Farm laborer in Pendleton County in 1860. Farmer in Bracken County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District No. 1, p. 389B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 662.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Illinois, Schuyler County, Frederick Township, p. 115B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Bracken County, KY, June & July 1863, p. 68.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994029, Bracken County Marriages.
